snippet.title: Whiz Kid for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Whiz Kid is an educational game.

You have to push ice blocks to make the word or equation that you see at the bottom (depending on the mode). 


What I think:

This is an okay educational game. The controls could be better, because the curling brush has to PIXEL-EXACTLY on the ice block you want to push.
